newsitem.title: USA: New York physical copper market - June 16.
newsitem.headline: New York physical copper market - June 16.

text.p: Based on COMEX settlement prices, merchant copper cathodes for June shipment were quoted at a nominal 124.75 to 125.50 cents a lb.
Dealers quoted No.2 scrap copper at a nominal 99.00 cents per lb, unchanged from June 13th.
